text: لم يطمثهن انس قبلهم ولا جان

translations.translation: Untouched before them by either man or jinn.
Undeflowered by man or by jinn before them, --
No man or jinn ever touched them before.
- untouched by jinn or mankind before.
Untouched by any man or jinn, before them.
Whom never deflowered a human before nor Jinn.
Man has not touched them before them nor jinni.
untouched before them by any man or jinn --
Whom neither man nor jinni will have touched before them -
Whom neither a man or jinn had ever touched before them.
There hath deflowered them neither man nor jinn.
Whom no human has touched before, nor jinn.
Whom no man or Jinn before them has touched;-
Whom no man or jinn yatmithhunna (has opened their hymens with sexual intercourse) before them.
Neither human nor jinn will have touched them before.
Whom no human has touched before, nor jinn.
Untouched before them by man or jinni -
[55:74] Untouched by any man before them, before these [soon-to-be] spouses of theirs, or jinn.
Whom neither man nor jinn will have touched before them) before their husbands

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ } [الرحمن: 73] أيها المكلفان الممنونان، وهؤلاء أيضاً { لَمْ يَطْمِثْهُنَّ إِنسٌ قَبْلَهُمْ وَلاَ جَآنٌّ } [الرحمن: 74] إذ كل منهن، إنما هي مقصورة على أعمال كل منهم بلا شركة




{ فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ } [الرحمن: 75] أيها المعتبران المستبصران
